data.message: Why is my Marketplace blocked?  It won't let me appeal

replies.message: Hi Deb. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2sPnYFw. -Brittany

I've been scammed and someone has gotten my passwords. I am in touch with the federal trade commission. I have been turned down for help from Facebook on 13 occasions. They say I violated federal laws and they won't restore my Marketplace. They refuse to tell me what I did at one point they mention payments. There are no payments on Facebook. I don't owe anyone anything. I cannot get anyone to help me. This has gone on for two weeks. 
My workplace divulged muss number and I cannot log into any worksite
Please please help me
It's going on 3 weeks.  I need good help!!!
